Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
kind of... 
make sure .conf diles ahve write things
make a pirvate key for KMD
make wp_7776 file with KMD WIF in it 
start KMD
start PIZZA and BEER 
import wif to those
fund chains
start iguana
splitfund 
call dpowassets for BEER/PIZZA

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: litterally all it is

Content: ./komodod -ac_name=PIZZA -ac_supply=100000000

Content: ( and add -pubkey=YOURPUBKEY)
